list.name: offset
list.label: Offset (ms)
list.description: Absolute time of the first preutterance

list.name: repeat
list.label: Max repeated
list.description: Maximum number of the created entries with the same phonemes

list.name: repeatSuffix
list.label: Repeat suffix template
list.description: The suffix template added to the repeated entries. "{number}" will be replaced by the number of the repeated alias

list.name: prefix
list.label: Prefix
list.description: Prefix of normal file names. Leave empty if you don't have a prefix

list.name: separator
list.label: Separator
list.description: Separator of syllables in the normal file names. e.g. enter "_" for file names like "_あ_あ_い_あ_う_え_あ", and leave empty for "_ああいあうえあ"

list.name: suffixes
list.label: Available suffixes
list.description: Suffixes that should be used to create the last entry in a file. Use "," to separate multiple items

list.name: appendSuffix
list.label: Append suffix
list.description: Append a suffix to all normal file names. e.g. If given "R", a "a R" will be created from `_ああいあうえあ.wav`

list.name: lengthVC
list.label: Consonant length (ms)
list.description: Distance between the preutterances of a VC and its next CV

list.name: useHeadCV
list.label: Head-style CV entries
list.description: Whether to create aliases like "- か" from the file head. Head style V entries such as "- あ" are created even if this is turned off

list.name: useVCV
list.label: VCV entries
list.description: Whether to duplicate VCV entries from CV. VV entries such as "a い" are created even if this is turned off

list.name: repeatC
list.label: Max repeated entry count of Consonant-only entries
list.description: Maximum number of the created Consonant-only entries with the same phonemes. e.g. "k" is duplicated from "a k" if set other than 0

list.name: order
list.label: Entry order
list.description: Rearrange the entries by putting entries with same type together

list.name: appendTags
list.label: Append tags
list.description: Whether to append types as tags to the entries

list.name: vowelMap
list.label: Vowel map
list.defaultValue: Search is applied with suffix matching

list.name: consonantMap
list.label: Consonant map
list.defaultValue:
Search is applied with exact matching.
 A line with no-consonant "" is required.
